statements: SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT full_name, contact_number FROM employees
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, email_address FROM employees ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT employee_id, full_name, contact_number FROM employees WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY full_name DESC, contact_number ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM employees WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' AND email_address LIKE '%@company.com' ORDER BY email_address ASC
SELECT employee_id, full_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE contact_number IN ('123456789', '987654321') ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE full_name LIKE '%son%' OR email_address LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT DISTINCT contact_number FROM employees ORDER BY contact_number ASC
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE employee_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM employment_history WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date, position FROM employment_history WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN employment_history ON employees.employee_id = employment_history.employee_id WHERE position = 'Manager' AND hire_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.employee_id = 1 AND d.department_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) FROM departments GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT e.first_name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_history eh ON e.employee_id = eh.employee_id JOIN departments d ON eh.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, email FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, title FROM employees JOIN titles ON employees.employee_id = titles.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, email FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT e.full_name, s.salary_amount FROM employees e JOIN salaries s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.full_name, t.title FROM employees e JOIN titles t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id WHERE t.to_date IS NULL;
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employees e ON d.department_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY d.department_name ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Departments WHERE location='New York';
SELECT job_title, min_salary, max_salary FROM Jobs WHERE min_salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, phone FROM Employees ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM Employees e JOIN Departments d ON e.employee_id = d.manager_id;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, s.salary FROM Employees e JOIN Salaries s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.start_date > '2020-01-01';
